description:
This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for kube-prometheus-stack.
This dashboard is originated by 9628(PostgreSQL Database by Lucas Estienne).

options.content: # IMPORTANT After each change please export this dashboard as JSON and update it in component-appcat repository

targets.expr:
1 - max without(prometheus_replica, organization) (
sum_over_time(slo:sli_error:ratio_rate5m{sloth_service=~"appcat-.+"}[$__range])
/ ignoring (sloth_window) count_over_time(slo:sli_error:ratio_rate5m{sloth_service=~"appcat-.+", service="VSHNPostgreSQL", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__range])
) >= 0

panels.title: General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

targets.expr: sum by (datname) (pg_stat_activity_count{datname!~"template.*", namespace=~"$instance_namespace", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"})

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.

title: VSHNPostgreSQL
